it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.transmission

Class CoapReliableTransmission

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.transmission.CoapReliableTransmission

  • public class CoapReliableTransmission
extends java.lang.Object
    CoAP reliable transmission. It can be used to send CONfirmable CoAP messages.
